description:
Kinako suddenly wakes up in the middle of class. Has everything that`s happened until now been a dream? And who are Bamyan and Tasuku?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Afternoon Moon, Appearing Up in the Sky One Day, with Kouhai
Kouhai to Itsuka Dete Aru Hiru no Tsuki
後輩と いつか出てある 昼の月
